text: James Stewart Bain (19 December 1947 - 23 January 2016) was a Scottish musician. He was best known as a bassist for the rock bands Rainbow and Dio with Ronnie James Dio. He also works with the Scorpions, John Cale, Gary Moore and wrote for Thin Lizzy frontman Phil Lynott. He was born in Newtonmore. Bain died on 23 January 2016 while on the Def Leppard's "Hysteria on the High Seas" cruise from pneumonia caused by lung cancer at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2016 deaths Category:British bass guitarists Category:British rock guitarists Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Scottish rock musicians Category:People from Highland
title: Jimmy Bain
